item.title: Red Team type of Access to Azure from Anywhere
item.description: ! Warning ! The content of this post might not be aligned with you company’s internal IT security rules, I suggest to talk to your manager and request an approval before you try this out in any of your environments. Introduction, setting the stage We should start with an overall picture of an imaginary Enterprise network Imagine that your ADFS is sitting behind the corporate firewall and your users cannot access it from the Internet without VPN.
